title: Trump says he expects to be arrested and calls on supporters to protest

description: Companies are replanting millions of hectares and generating revenue through carbon credit sales

title: Investigators sniff out the hidden fragrance industry
description: Luxury perfumes are popular but the companies behind many famous brands are now in the spotlight

title: The photographer who captured the birth of modern Iraq — and what could have been
description: Latif al-Ani chronicled his country’s transition to modernity. 20 years after the US invasion, his images are painful but necessary viewing

title: Things are only getting harder for the Fed
description: We should be thankful that the past two weeks of banking stress did not happen sooner
